brand.name: SKI HOUSE+
brand.tagline: Premium ski & snowboard rental and private lessons in Gudauri.

location.directions:
In Gudauri, we run a rental focused on quality and service. Not just "handing out a set", but fitting you with gear so you feel comfortable, safe, and enjoy every run. We also have 2 shops, so pickup and return is easier — choose the location closer to you.

The selection is big: skis, snowboards, boots, bindings, kids' sets — all matched by size and skill level. Want a calm, comfortable ride? We'll choose something softer and easier. Need speed, control, and a more "sporty" feel? We'll find the right setup for your style. Before you head out, we'll adjust the bindings, check boot fit, and explain the key points — clear and to the point.

If you want to "get everything at once", that's easy too. Along with the main set, we offer clothing and accessories: jackets and pants, helmets, masks/goggles, gloves — so you're ready for any day in the mountains.

We also have instructors. If it's your first time on the slopes — they'll help you build a solid base and feel confident. If you already ride — they'll show you how to improve technique and ski safer.

We want rental to feel like care and convenience: you come in, get fitted fast, go ride — and think only about enjoying the mountains.

pageTitles.servicesSubtitle: We keep your gear in top condition — fast, carefully and to service standards. We handle everything from routine maintenance to full repairs for skis, snowboards and related equipment. Our workshop can help with base repairs, P-tex filling, edge tuning and sharpening, stone grinding (where available), hot waxing, binding checks and adjustments, and general inspections to make sure your equipment is safe and feels great on snow.
pageTitles.servicesSubtitle2: Whether you need a quick refresh before the next run or a proper fix after hitting rocks, we'll restore performance, improve glide, and help your gear last longer — with clear recommendations and fair turnaround times.
pageTitles.footerDescription: Premium rentals and lessons in Gudauri — we'll gear you up fast with no unnecessary waiting. Clean, well-serviced equipment and a friendly team that truly helps.

items.name: Nika
items.title: Certified instructor • 7+ years of experience
items.experience: Nika is an experienced instructor with international certification, specializing in teaching basic technique and improving carving skills. Her approach is based on patience and individual attention to each student. Helps overcome the fear of first descents and confidently master the slopes of Gudauri.

items.name: Sandro
items.title: Freeride coach • 10+ years of experience
items.experience: Sandro is a professional freeride instructor with over ten years of experience. Trained in avalanche safety and off-piste skiing techniques. His passion is to show the beauty of untouched snow and teach safe skiing in the mountains. Works with both advanced riders and those just starting to explore freeride.

items.name: Mariam
items.title: Children's instructor • 6+ years of experience
items.experience: Mariam is a specialized instructor for working with children. Has special training in child psychology and teaching methods. Creates a safe and fun atmosphere in lessons where children not only learn to ski but also enjoy the process. Her lessons are structured, clear and adapted to each child's age.
